Projects.Name: Creator-fan social media platform
Projects.Description: Contributed to the design, development, and testing of a social media platform aimed at transforming the dynamics between content creators and their fan base by implementing exclusive content timelines and chat features.

Projects.Name: Sport events platform
Projects.Description: Contributed to the design, development, and testing of a sports event platform by enabling users to create sports events, join ongoing events, and track their progress.

Projects.Name: Blood donation platform
Projects.Description: Contributed to the design, development, and testing of a blood donation platform focused on accessibility and efficiency in blood donation processes where users can track their donations, schedule donations and locate nearby donation centers.

Projects.Name: Installation management platform
Projects.Description: Contributed to the design, development, and testing of a comprehensive platform aimed at facilitating connections between manufacturers and retailers with a wide variety of installation resources (i.e. retail store displays).

Projects.Name: Technical security platform
Projects.Description: Contributed to the design, development, and testing of a technical security platform integrating various IoT devices like cameras, fire alarms and access control.

Projects.Name: Conference device management platform
Projects.Description: Contributed to the design, development, and testing of a conference device management platform focusing on managing conferencing devices such as microphones and speakers.

As a QA Associate at Nanobit, I was responsible for conducting feature software testing, meticulously searching for bugs, and accurately reproducing reported issues. I excelled in writing detailed bug reports, providing comprehensive information to aid in the resolution process. Additionally, I played a crucial role in giving feedback on software functionalities, contributing to the overall improvement of product quality.

As a QA Associate at UniqCast, I conducted black box testing, both manual and automatic, ensuring the quality and functionality of software products. Additionally, I provided customer support, addressing queries and issues to enhance user experience. I also engaged in some QML programming, contributing directly to software development. Furthermore, I played a role in writing technical documentation, providing valuable resources for users and internal teams.
